thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 09 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-State Bank Of India Posts Dec Qtr Standalone Net Loss

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-State Bank Of India Posts Dec Qtr Standalone Net Loss
text:
Feb 9 (Reuters) - State Bank Of India:
* DEC QUARTER STANDALONE NET LOSS 24.16 BILLION RUPEES * DEC QUARTER STANDALONE INTEREST EARNED 548.03 BILLION RUPEES
* DEC QUARTER STANDALONE PROVISIONS & CONTINGENCIES 188.76 BILLION RUPEES
* DEC QUARTER STANDALONE PROVISIONS FOR NPAS 177.60 BILLION RUPEES
* DEC QUARTER STANDALONE GROSS NPA 10.35 PERCENT VERSUS 9.83 PERCENT PREVIOUS QUARTER
* DEC QUARTER STANDALONE NET NPA 5.61 PERCENT VERSUS 5.43 PERCENT PREVIOUS QUARTER
* CONSENSUS FORECAST FOR DEC QUARTER STANDALONE PROFIT WAS 20.67 BILLION RUPEES Source text - bit.ly/2H16nOo Further company coverage:
